1.title: Lawnmower Racing

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: Why waste time cutting your lawn when you can soup up your lawn more to run at fifty miles per hour. Which, of course, raises the question; who's mower is fastest. Dave abandons all reason and his quite healthy fear to learn to wrestle alligators. Then Dave explores chess boxing.

2.title: Rockcrawling

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: Dave Mordal travels America to discover the activities of questionable wisdom American's call "fun".

3.title: Demo Derby

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: Dave meets a family that thinks it's a tragic waste to turn a perfectly good junk car into scrap, or at least not until it's totally destroyed in a demolition derby. Next, he's off to Sommerset for the medieval battle of his life. Then Dave sees a boat race that would make Peter Peter Pumpkin Eater proud.

4.title: Crazy Race

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Dave enters a school bus race and fulfills every school kid's dream, not racing the school bus, crashing it. Next he enters a quick draw contest and survives. Then Dave meets a man building a castle to be his fortress refuge from the government.

5.title: Mini-Moto

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: Dave enters a school bus race and fulfills every school kid's dream, not racing the school bus, crashing it. Next he enters a quick draw contest and survives. Then Dave meets a man building a castle to be his fortress refuge from the government.

6.title: Bigfoot Paintball

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

6.plot: Dave joins a paintball team to play capture the flag where the "flag" is a living, breathing Bigfoot. Still anxious for competition Dave enters a boat race. But no fiberglass and teak for Dave. These boats are hand crafted from state of the art cardboard. Then Dave meets a man constructing the ultimate suit of armor.

7.title: Bonneville

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

7.plot: Dave visits the Bonneville Speedway to set a personal best speed record and meets others trying for world titles in some curious categories. He joins a group of students who take their share of bumps and bruises learning to be a rodeo clown, alias; bull target. For a finale imbued with culture and artistry Dave partakes of a freestyle canoeing competition.

8.title: Swamp Buggy Racing

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

8.plot: If it moves, people race it. If the track is a swamp then Dave has to race a swamp buggy. After that Dave visits Firefest where experimental fireworks are displayed which, of course, is a bad place for Dave to be. Then Dave meets a man who designs exercise equipment with a purpose.

9.title: Pumpkin Chunkin

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

9.plot: Dave visits a festival where the participants have graduated from potato cannons to heavy artillery; pumpkins. As if that's not enough bang Dave meets some folks who like shooting at explosive targets. Dave's last guest insists it's time for Olympic juggling.

10.title: Soap Box Racing

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

10.plot: A secret society operating untested, unlicensed vehicles at maximum speed and it's perfectly legal; that's gravity racing and Dave is ready for a go. Then Dave, ex-marine and experienced hunter, is back in school learning to hunt with birds. And for this he needs a license? Then, fresh from the pumpkin chucking competition Dave visits some folks using really dangerous ammo; fruitcakes.

11.title: Vintage Snow Mobile

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

11.plot: In his ongoing search for obscure racing surfaces Dave finds an ice track where he races a vintage snow mobile. Staying with the ice theme Dave meets two guys building the ultimate Rube Goldberg machine; a mouse trap game in ice sculpture. Finally, another Olympic wannabe, Dave competes, sort of, in the game we all know and love, dodge ball.

12.title: Tank-Athalon

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

12.plot: Dave finally found a race with no fear of getting hurt. He's driving a tank though an obstacle course which, of course, is bad news for the obstacles. Dave meets a couple guys who love dolphins so much they design boats that look like dolphins, swim like dolphins and even porpoise like dolphins. If you ever wondered what it's like for the dogs pulling a dog sled, join Dave in a human dog sled race.

13.title: Bar Stool Sledding

episode of.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (TV Series 2009– )

13.plot: Dave learns that sitting on a barstool may not mean you're a lush. You might be dreaming up a great new gravity game like barstool racing. Next, our ex-marine is back in his element at sniper school. Then Dave dons skis, grabs a rope and races down main street behind a horse in a crazy little race known as ski jorring.

imdb.title: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal
akas: Wreckreation Nation with Dave Mordal (United States)
plot: Dave Mordal travels America to discover the activities of questionable wisdom Americans call "fun".::David Foss
